s0382: Xiang Yu from this resented Bu.
s0383: Han second year winter, Xiang Yu then went north to Chengyang, Tian Rong also led troops to battle together.
s0384: Tian Rong could not win, fled to Pingyuan, Pingyuan people killed him.
s0385: Then went north burning and destroying Qi city walls houses, all buried Tian Rong's surrendering soldiers, captured and enslaved their old and weak women.
s0386: Marched through Qi to Beihai, destroyed much.
s0387: Qi people gathered and rebelled against him.
s0388: Therefore Tian Rong's younger brother Tian Heng gathered Qi fleeing soldiers got tens of thousands, rebelled at Chengyang.
s0389: Xiang Yu stayed, fought continuously but could not take it.
s0390: Spring, Han King led five lords' troops, total fifty-six thousand men, attacked Chu east.
s0391: Xiang Yu heard this, immediately ordered the generals to attack Qi, while he personally with elite troops thirty thousand went south from Lu through Huling.
s0392: Fourth month, Han had all entered Pengcheng, collected its goods treasures and beauties, daily held wine feasts.
s0393: Xiang Yu attacked Han army at Lingbi, greatly defeated them, killed many.
s0394: The Han army fled, Xiang Yu pursued to Yinque, the Han army surrendered.
s0395: Xiang Yu divided the surrendering Han army into two, ordered the Chu army to cross the Si River, buried alive the surrendering soldiers.
s0396: Xiang Yu then camped at Gaixia, the Han army fled south to the Yangtze.
s0397: Xiang Yu heard Liu Bang had fled to Han, sent Bu Gong to pursue and attack Liu Bang.
s0398: Liu Bang sent Lu Wan to defend Yan, attacked Wei Bao at Wei.
s0410: Xiang Yu returned to Chu, attacked Liu Bang at Guling.
s0411: Liu Bang fled to Pingcheng, Xiang Yu pursued to Henei.
s0412: Liu Bang sent Zhang Liang to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu.
s0413: Xiang Yu agreed to divide the world at Hong Canal, east for Chu, west for Han.
s0414: Xiang Yu released Liu Bang's father and wife.
s0415: Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Liu Bang camped at Chenggao.
s0416: Xiang Yu attacked Liu Bang at Chenggao, Liu Bang fled.
s0417: Xiang Yu pursued to Yongqiu, Liu Bang fled to Chenliu.
s0418: Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu, Liu Bang fled to Xingyang.
s0419: Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang, Liu Bang fled through Xiaopi.
s0420: Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth, Liu Bang fled to Henei.
s0421: Xiang Yu attacked Henei, Liu Bang fled to Pingcheng.
s0422: Liu Bang sent Guo Ji to negotiate peace, Xiang Yu agreed.
s0423: Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Liu Bang camped at Xiaohe.
s0424: Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi, Han Xin fled.
s0425: Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang, Peng Yue fled.
s0426: Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang.
s0427: Liu Bang sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu.
s0428: Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.'
s0429: Liu Bang agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege.
s0430: Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu, Liu Bang camped at Xiaohe.
s0431: Xiang Yu attacked Liu Bang at Xiaohe, Liu Bang fled.
s0432: Xiang Yu pursued to Henei, Liu Bang fled to Yongqiu.
s0433: Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu, Liu Bang fled to Chenliu.
s0434: Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu, Liu Bang fled to Xingyang.
s0435: Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang, Liu Bang fled through Xiaopi.
s0436: Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth, Liu Bang fled to Henei.
s0437: Xiang Yu attacked Henei, Liu Bang fled to Pingcheng.
s0438: Liu Bang sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace, Xiang Yu agreed.
s0439: Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Liu Bang camped at Xiaohe.
s0440: Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin fled again.
